execution_quality: Agent performed manual work competently but misunderstood the user's actual intent; the user expected automated tool usage rather than manual file editing.
work_category: Manual changelog and diff reconstruction for two recent versions, with file editing and Git operations to update project documentation.
summary: The agent misinterpreted a vague request and performed extensive manual changelog/diff work through file editing, when the user actually meant to run an automated sync tool. The corrective follow-up message reveals a fundamental misalignment: the agent did not ask for clarification on an ambiguous request and instead chose a labor-intensive manual approach. The task demonstrates poor intent recognition despite reasonable execution of the chosen approach.
follow_up_pattern: User clarified the correct approach (using sync tool), indicating the agent should abandon manual work and use the proper automation.
